title: Leadership
description: The ability to influence a group toward the achievement of a vision or set of goals.

title: Organization
description: The ability to plan, prioritize, and execute tasks in a timely and efficient manner.

title: Communication
description: The ability to effectively exchange information with others.

title: Teamwork
description: The ability to work collaboratively with a group of people in order to achieve a common goal.

title: Problem Solving
description: The ability to identify and solve problems in a timely manner.

title: Creativity
description: The ability to think of new and unique ideas.

title: Time Management
description: The ability to use one's time effectively and efficiently.

title: Adaptability
description: The ability to adapt to different situations and environments.

title: Flexibility
description: The ability to adapt to different situations and environments.

title: Self Motivation
description: The ability to be internally inspired to perform a task.
